props.current_music: Did You Ever Have to Make Up Your Mind?

comments.upictitle: A Very Friendly Asshole: NEVER FORGET
comments.article: I picked most of them, but I wanted to tell you my very different reason for wanting one of Joffrey... so I can STEP ON HIM! >:)
that's beautiful. I chose all of them because well they are all so great. I know that not all can be made right away, but damn.
I wouldn't worry about Tyrion. Such a fan favorite not making it in a fan voted poll would be ridiculous.
Great choices -- but I really want to see an Arya Stark (or one of her other guises)!
My Arya (icon) wants to see Arya too!

Lady Catelyn Stark, before the Red Wedding, or after? The two would be very different. Though I can't decide which I would prefer.
For that matter, I'm probably not the target audience. I no longer have any friends with whom to do miniature-type things with anymore, and, awesome as they are, I'm still unlikely to buy them just to have them. So I probably shouldn't even vote on this one.
I would want one of both, really.

All of them!
And Eddard :(
Tyrion! Tyrion! Tyrion!
Icon love!

comments.upictitle: Names Is For Tombstones, Baby: JRR!
comments.article:
It ain't often easy, it ain't often kind...

I picked a nice spread -- two females and two males: Asha and Joffrey, the Viper and Catelyn. But only if it's UnCat. Otherwise, I'd vote Brienne instead.

comments.upictitle: Xray Is As Xray Does: fly!
comments.article: I did the 2 male/2 female thing as well: Tyrion and Oberyn; Brienne and Catelyn.
Where's the love for the Red Viper?  It's like these people didn't read the same books I did!
I'm with you.

Catelyn Stark if post-Red Wedding. :-)

Otherwise, maybe not so high on the list.
why isn't daeni on the list?
oh, just read the post below. silly busy friends list. since daeni is in (yay yay), i would suggest arya for the next run. :)

comments.article: Lets show some love for Brienne, the Maid of Tarth!

comments.upictitle: Madam Lulzy the Great: Deedlit Relaxing
comments.article: She is second!
I'm all about some Red Viper.
Prince Martell all the way!

go tyrion :D

excellent idea, mr. Martin!
I'd love to see one of Arya, she was absolutely my favorite character, then Tyrion, then Catelyn, then Samwell.
Seconded, I can't believe Arya isn't on the list!
I put Tyrian and Catelyn if post Red Wedding, cause they'd look awesome as minatures. I think more "monsterous" looking people look better as miniatures.

I want Arya Stark too

but to honest I voted for most of them (especially the Imp)

comments.upictitle: Gustave XIII "The Steel": Normal is boring Boring Mana Khemia Roxis
comments.article: If you're doing the Mountain, it's almost obligatory to do the Red Viper....
That's a very good point.
I'd really like to see an Arya miniature.
SAMWELL!  How I love him.
One of my favorites as well.  I voted for a bunch though.  I also was surprised by the lack of love for the Viper.

comments.upictitle: move along, nothing to see here.: splendor
comments.article: Tyrionnnnnnn! ;o;
shae as well, so tyron won't get lonely
tyrion is one of the most compelling characters in the entire genre.

comments.upictitle: Madam Lulzy the Great: Deedlit Relaxing
comments.article: Everyone's gettin' shafted, though. >_>
I went with the Red Viper! Not because he is my favorite character (who right now is Jaime) but because I think he would make an awesome miniature.
